profile.name: Salvatore Sanfilippo
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Redis Labs
profile.summary: Highly skilled developer with a passion for open-source projects and technical innovation. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained MicroPython drivers for various sensors and displays, including FT6x06 capacitive touch sensor, vl53l0x TOF sensor, UC8151 / IL0373 MicroPython e-paper display driver, and BMA423 accelerometer driver.
Contributed to the development of compression algorithms, text drawing libraries, and an emulator for the ZX Spectrum.
Collaborated with the Redis Labs team to integrate MicroPython into the Redis platform.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained various open-source projects, including a Telegram bot framework.
Contributed to the development of C programming libraries and tools, such as SMAZ2 compression algorithm and hping network tool.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated various open-source projects, including MicroPython drivers for different sensors and displays.
Contributed to the development of text drawing libraries and other technical projects.
